text: [And they say, 'Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord·∏ç' Say, 'Surely God has the power to send down a sign] but most of them have no knowledge': about the sending down of signs. For the manifestation of each one of His attributes in every one of the loci of engendered beings is a sign of Him by which those who have knowledge are able to know Him.
